吆.definition: to shout; to bawl; to yell (to urge on an animal); to hawk (one's wares)

吆五喝六.definition: lit. to shout out hoping for fives and sixes when gambling with dice; a hubbub of gambling

吆喝.definition: to shout; to bawl; to yell (to urge on an animal); to hawk (one's wares); to denounce loudly; to shout slogans
